title: Miniature Portrait of Elnathan Haskell (1755-1825)
provenance_text: By descent to Charlotte Haskell Rhett, daughter of the sitter; by descent to James Moore Rhett, her son; by descent to James Moore Rhett, his nephew, Beaufort, SC, until July 1918; (sold at William Macbeth, Inc., New York, NY); purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, July 12, 1918; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927.

creator.birth_place: Dublin (County Dublin, Leinster, Republic of Ireland)
